title: Looking to add some T213-2 Coupons
author: Mikehealer

posts.post_title: Looking to add some T213-2 Coupons
posts.post_content:
Would like to get a little closer to finishing my T213-2 Coupon HOF subset(still need 24 more). If you have any I need in similar condition to the scan below let me know.
I'm willing to buy or trade.
Thanks,
Mike
[url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]


[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/forsaleortrade/giant/all%20in%20one%20copy_1.jpg[/IMG]
Beautiful run you have going there Mike!
Thanks Pete, but they don't hold a candle to those big headed 19th century presidents.

Really nice looking cards.  

I am working on the same subset but I have been figuring 21 different Hall of Famers, with team and pose variations totaling 48 cards all together.  You are showing 25 cards, still needing 24.  

Wonder where we differ. :D:D:D

Sorry, I do not have any extras that you need.

Hi Ron, 21 is correct, 49 total, here is a list with the number of cards with each HOFer.

Baker-3
Bender-6
Bresnahan-2
Brown-2
Chance-4
Cobb-2
Collins-3
Crawford-1
Evers-1
Griffith-1
Huggins-2
Jennings-2
Johnson-1
Kelley-2
Lajoie-3
Marquard-4
Matty-1
McGraw-2
Speaker-1
Tinker-4
Wheat-2

Thanks.  That helps. 

Good luck finding the rest.  I have a feeling we both have the easy ones. :D:D:D
